Posts.Content: Can anyone tell me what North Staffs is like?? BC nurses have been brilliant, but I am just starting out on treatment, any insights????
Posts.Title: first appointment

Posts.Content: Damn! Forgot to record it, lol, but sounds like I'm not missing much - we all have our own probkems we can't escape from
Posts.Title: TRivial BUT..............

Posts.Content: This is really good to know for those that need chemo. Â I did something really stupid even before I had been officially diagnosed, I got in my mind that I definitely had cancer and would lose my hair following chemo, so I might as well get it cut now and no-one will notice!!! Result is that 5 weeks on, I don't need chemo, only radio, and I have short (1.5" all over) hair and it was all unnecessary, moral to story, take each day as it comes, and wait to hear your diagnosis before you do anything too stupid, XD
Posts.Title: Strength in Style at Toni and Guy
